"""
    lsqrfact(A,b)

Solve a linear least-squares problem by QR factorization. Returns
the minimizer of ||b-Ax||.
"""
function lsqrfact(A,b)
    Q,R = qr(A)
    c = Q'*b
    x = backsub(R,c)
    return x
end
